definition: A popular sport played with a round object, typically involving two teams of players who use various parts of their bodies to kick, pass, and score goals. It is commonly played on a grass field and is widely followed and enjoyed by fans around the world.

examples.german: Fußball ist ein beliebter Sport in Deutschland.
examples.english: Football is a popular sport in Germany.

examples.german: Ich spiele gerne Fußball mit meinen Freunden.
examples.english: I enjoy playing football with my friends.

examples.german: Die Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft findet alle vier Jahre statt.
examples.english: The FIFA World Cup takes place every four years.

examples.german: Mein Bruder ist ein großer Fußballfan.
examples.english: My brother is a big football fan.
Football players often earn a lot of money.
